TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant filed an action with the Bratislava II ORG . He claimed reimbursement of a purchase price .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG found that the applicant 's right to a hearing without unjustified delay had been violated , awarded him the equivalent of MONEY ( ORG ) at that time as just satisfaction , ordered the court concerned to avoid any further delay in the proceedings and to reimburse the applicant 's legal costs .
CARDINAL . On CARDINAL DATE the district court delivered a judgment .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG , on the defendant 's appeal , quashed the first - instance judgment and remitted the case for further examination to the district court .
CARDINAL . On DATE the district court delivered a judgment . Following the defendant 's appeal , the proceedings are pending before ORG .
